TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MetaForeignKeyColumn extends System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn

summary.span: 表示 ASP.NET 动态数据使用的数据库外键字段。

span.span: Represents a database foreign-key field that is used by ASP.NET Dynamic Data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 动态数据应用程序中类表示表示一对一关系的数据库列。In ASP.NET Dynamic Data applications, the class represents a database column that denotes a one-to-one relationship. 类表示包含外键字段的表中的列。The class represents the column in the table that contains the foreign-key field. 但是，可以通过访问父表对象属性。However, you can access the parent table object by using the property. 你可以确定外键字段是否包含使用的表中的主键属性。You can determine if the foreign-key field is a primary key in the table that contains it by using the property.

param.name: dictionary
param.span: 包含数据字段的新值的词典对象。

span.span: A dictionary object that contains the new values for a data field.
The value of the foreign key.

summary.span: 在指定的词典中保存外键值。

span.span: Saves the value of a foreign key in the specified dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于将外键的值保存在包含的数据字段的所有新值的字典。The method is used to save the value of a foreign key in the dictionary that contains all the new values for a data field. 通常情况下，从选择新值时使用方法外键字段的控件。Typically, the method is used when a new value is selected from a control for the foreign key field.

span.span: Gets a collection that contains the names of the foreign keys in the association that represents a database relationship.
A collection that contains the names of the foreign keys.

span.span: The name of the foreign key.

summary.span: 返回映射到外键的替换名称。

span.span: Returns the alternate name that is mapped to a foreign key.

returns.span: 映射到外键的替换名称。

span.span: The alternate name that is mapped to the foreign key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回而不是实际的外键名称的筛选表达式中使用的备用名称。This method returns the alternate name that is used in a filtering expression instead of the actual foreign-key name. 如果备用名称不存在，该方法将返回外键的实际名称。If an alternate name does not exist, the method returns the actual name of the foreign key.

span.span: The path for the details action page of the parent table of the specified foreign-key field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回基于为 ASP.NET 动态数据应用程序定义的路由的详细信息操作页的路径。The method returns the path for the details action page based on the routes defined for the ASP.NET Dynamic Data application. 如果此方法返回空字符串，`row`是`null`。This method returns an empty string, if `row` is `null`. 使用方法等同于调用方法并传递作为第一个参数的操作。Using the method is the same as invoking the method passing the action as the first parameter.
